item.description:
Halloween is coming up, so why not participate in the Halloween tradition of pumpkin carving?

Will and I will be glad to host you over at our new place in Quincy, so please come on by to enjoy some messy fun with pumpkins! Please ignore all the boxes that will be lying everywhere - we have just moved in and have barely started to unpack :P

I have purchased four pumpkin carving kits, but feel free to bring your own. Also, feel free to bring a good table spoon for cleaning out your pumpkin.

Unlike most of our meetup events, there is a small fee required for the cost of the pumpkins and pumpkin carving equipment.


Directions from North Quincy Station:

1) exit North Quincy Station using the SQUANTUM ST exit.
2) Upon exiting the station, walk across the street (please be careful), and start walking down Holmes Street directly in front of you.
3) Take a left onto Moscow Street
4) Walk through/near the 711 Parking Lot and cross the street
5) Very briefly walk up Hancock Street on your right (less than 40 feet)
6) Take a left onto Glover Street, walking past the church on your right and Sacred Heart School on your left
7) Take a right onto Felton Street.
8) Our house is white with a windowed porch
9) Go through the porch door and come enter through the left door in front of you.

Please make use of the following Google Map to find out where you need to go:

http://maps.google.co...


Driving Directions from I-93S:

1) Take exit 12, staying in the right lane
2) Whilte staying in the right lane, follow the sign to Quincy
3) Go over Neponset bridge, bearing right toward Hancock Street/3A. DO NOT follow the bridge toward Quincy Shore Dr.
4) Follow Hancock Street, passing several gas stations
5) Take a left onto Glover Ave (IGNORE the DO NOT ENTER signs - you will be arriving after 4 PM)
6) Start to look for parking
7) Take a right onto Felton St (Parking here is difficult!)
8) Keep looking for parking ...

This map may help you:

http://maps.google.co...

May our pumpkins be masterpieces! Well, may they at least be interesting :)

- Rob
item.name: Pumpkin Carving!
